comment: Sample: msg_id="1F00-0001" ScanD -- Process failed to start

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Gateway Anti-Virus" name="Process failed to start" description="Cannot start ScanD"

comment: Sample: msg_id="1F01-0015" ScanD -- Ready for service

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Gateway Anti-Virus" name="Ready for service" description="ScanD ready"
$MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="Process exiting" description="SIGD shutting down"
$MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="Process crashed" description="SIGD crashed"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2E01-0017" SIGD -- License failed to load

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="License failed to load" description="Cannot load the license"

comment: Name: Failed to start the signature update for the specified services
Sample: msg_id="2E01-0018" SIGD -- Failed to the start signature update for the specified services
Description: Cannot start the signature update for 'IPS'
Format: Cannot start the signature update for '%s'

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="Failed to start the signature update for the specified services" description="Cannot start the signature update for 'IPS'"

comment: Name: Failed to check the available signature version on the server
Sample: msg_id="2E01-0019" SIGD -- Failed to check the available signature version on the server
Description: Cannot complete the version check
Format: Cannot complete the version check

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="Failed to check the available signature version on the server" description="Cannot complete the version check"

comment: Name: Signature update process failed to start
Sample: msg_id="2E01-001A" SIGD -- Signature update process failed to start
Description: Cannot start the signature update process
Format: Cannot start the signature update process

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="Signature update process failed to start" description="Cannot start the signature update process"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2E01-001B" SIGD -- Signature update process crashed

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="Signature update process crashed" description="SIGD Worker crashed"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2E02-0065" SIGD -- Signature update process started

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="Signature update process started" description="Scheduled DLP update started"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2E02-0066" Scheduled DLP update for version (4.94) completed
Description: SIGD -- Signature update process completed

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="Signature update process completed" description="SIGD -- Signature update process completed"

comment: Name: Signature update process for the specified version failed
Sample: msg_id="2E02-0067" Manual DLP update for version(4.94) failed (Valid feature key not available)
Description: SIGD -- Signature update process for the specified version failed

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="Signature update process for the specified version failed" description="SIGD -- Signature update process for the specified version failed"

comment: Name: Device has the latest signature version for the specified service
Sample: msg_id="2E02-0069" SIGD -- Device has the latest signature version for specified service
Description: Device already has the latest DLP signature version (4.94)
Format: Device already has the latest %s signature version (%s)

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / Signature Update" name="Device has the latest signature version for the specified service" description="Device already has the latest DLP signature version (4.94)"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2300-0001" spamD -- Failed to start

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / spamBlocker" name="Failed to start" description="Cannot start spamD"

comment: Sample: msg_id="2300-0002" spamD -- Ready for service

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Security Services / spamBlocker" name="Ready for service" description="spamD ready"

comment: Sample: msg_id="7600-0000" The certificate used by SAML is changed and admin need to update this certificate to IDP server
Description: Certificate for SAML is changed, please update SP certificate on IdP server.
Format: Certificate for SAML is changed, please update SP certificate on IdP server.

update.message: $MESSAGE NEOMeta: area="Access Portal / Portal Wrapper" name="SAML certificate changes" description="Certificate for SAML is changed, please update SP certificate on IdP server."
